welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ganshoren, Belgium! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city and its rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ganshoren has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all commercial flights at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
